description: A delicious and super easy vegan chocolate cake. Moist and crumbly made without any butter or eggs. Vegan Recipe.
keywords: easy cake recipe, quick vegan cake, vegan cake recipe
name: Chocolate Cake (Vegan)
recipeIngredient: 4 tablespoons high fat oil (I used 2 Tbsp organic canola oil and 2 Tbsp Coconut oil)
5-6 tablespoons raw sugar or equivalent jaggery or other sweetener.
3 tablespoons cocoa powder (I have organic fair trade unsweetened non alkaline, reduce cocoa powder if you like less dark cake)
6-8 Tablespoons warm water or non dairy milk
vegan chocolate chips (optional, I dint use any, you can add some to the batter for melted chips in the cake!)

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add chopped apple, flax meal, vinegar, sugar, vanilla extract, oil and 6 Tablespoons warm water.
Blend into a smooth puree and keep aside.
In a bowl, mix the flours, cinnamon, salt, baking powder and cocoa powder.

Add in the apple puree and mix till just about combined. If the mixture doesnt become moist and pasty, add more water. The water content need depends on the water content of the apple. The batter does not need to be smooth and runny.
Grease a mini loaf and pour the batter in it.
Top with some oats and bake in preheated oven at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until the toothpick inserted in the Middle comes out clean.
Or top it off with some chocolate cream. Blend some avocado, a couple of teaspoons of cocoa powder and maple syrup to get a cream. Adjust sweetness and layer it on the cake!
